review_text: All you need to know is that mine broke the first time I used it. The clear top didn't fit on the base and when I went to dismantle the inner arm it broke in my hands.It may have been defective.  I don't know.  But, I certainly wouldn't recommend it.
summary: Mine broke the first time I used it
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
